meanings.definition: Of, relating to, or characteristic of citrus fruits.
meanings.sent1: The citrous aroma of the orange filled the room.
meanings.sent2: She enjoyed the tangy taste of the citrous lemonade.
meanings.sent3: The citrous scent of the oranges made her feel like she was in a fruit garden.
meanings.sent4: His cheerful personality was as refreshing as a citrous breeze.
meanings.sent5: The citrous colors of the fruits brightened up the kitchen.
